# Configuration

This is the default configuration file, everything is pretty much self explanatory

```
// This file was auto-generated by SourceMod (v1.8.0.6040)
// ConVars for plugin "hawthorne.smx"


// management server address including port and protocol
// -
// Default: "http://127.0.0.1:80"
ht_MANAGER "http://127.0.0.1"

// management server provided token (required)
// -
// Default: ""
// REPLACE THIS ONE, WITH ONE OF YOURS
ht_MANAGER_token "13d4cd8e-3f8a-4da4-8b0f-ea6a82adc785"

// Toggle the internal admin module
// -
// Default: "1"
// Minimum: "0.000000"
// Maximum: "1.000000"
ht_admin "1"

// Toggle the internal ban module
// -
// Default: "1"
// Minimum: "0.000000"
// Maximum: "1.000000"
ht_ban "1"

// Toggle of serverwide bans
// -
// Default: "0"
// Minimum: "0.000000"
// Maximum: "1.000000"
ht_global_ban "0"

// Toggle of serverwide mute & gags
// -
// Default: "0"
// Minimum: "0.000000"
// Maximum: "1.000000"
ht_global_mutegag "0"

// Toggle the internal chatlog module
// -
// Default: "1"
// Minimum: "0.000000"
// Maximum: "1.000000"
ht_log "1"

// Toggle the internal mute and gag module
// -
// Default: "1"
// Minimum: "0.000000"
// Maximum: "1.000000"
ht_punish "1"
```
